from manim import *

class DecimalTableExample(Scene):
    def construct(self):
        x_vals = [-2,-1,0,1,2]
        y_vals = np.exp(x_vals)
        t0 = DecimalTable(
            [x_vals, y_vals],
            row_labels=[MathTex("x"), MathTex("f(x)=e^{x}")],
            h_buff=1,
            element_to_mobject_config={"num_decimal_places": 2})
        self.add(t0)
